hooks.command: if [ -f .golem/state.json ] && command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[GOLEM] Phase: $(python3 -c "import json; print(json.load(open('.golem/state.json')).get('phase','unknown'))" 2>/dev/null) | Tasks: $(python3 -c "import json; s=json.load(open('.golem/state.json')); print(f\"{s.get('tasks_completed',0)}/{s.get('tasks_total',0)}\")" 2>/dev/null)"; fi

command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; cmd_lower=$(echo "$cmd" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'); case "$cmd_lower" in *'rm -rf /'*|*'drop database'*|*'drop table'*|*'truncate'*|*'git push'*'--force'*|*'> /dev/'*) echo "BLOCKED: Destructive command detected." >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac; }

command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; cmd_lower=$(echo "$cmd" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'); case "$cmd_lower" in *'git push'*origin*main*|*'git push'*origin*master*) echo 'BLOCKED: Direct push to main/master. Use feature branches.' >&2; exit 2;; *) exit 0;; esac; }

command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || exit 0; jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read f; if [ -n "$f" ]; then mkdir -p .golem/logs 2>/dev/null; echo "$(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S) $f" >> .golem/logs/file-changes.log 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0; }
